meanings.definition: A person who does not migrate.
meanings.sent1: The village had many nonmigrants who had lived there their whole lives.
meanings.sent2: Nonmigrants prefer to stay in one place rather than travel.
meanings.sent3: The nonmigrants in the town were like the sturdy oak trees, rooted in their community.
meanings.sent4: The nonmigrants were the anchors of the neighborhood, keeping traditions alive.
meanings.sent5: The nonmigrants were like rocks in the river, unmoved by the currents of change.

meanings.definition: Not migrating or moving from one place to another.
meanings.sent1: The nonmigrants plants in the garden require less maintenance.
meanings.sent2: The nonmigrants birds stayed in the same trees all year round.
meanings.sent3: The nonmigrants clouds seemed to be stuck in the sky, refusing to move.
meanings.sent4: The nonmigrants river flowed steadily, never changing its course.
meanings.sent5: The nonmigrants lifestyle was peaceful and stable, untouched by wanderlust.
